task.title: Show Project in File System Viewer
task.shortdesc: Show a project's location using your computer's file system viewer.

step.cmd: Mouse over the project you wish to archive in the Project List pane.
step.stepresult: Two buttons will appear next to your project name; Create .zip archive of phon project... and Show project in file system viewer.

step.cmd: Click Show project in file system viewer. Alternately, right-click (CTRL+click) on your project and choose Show project from the context menu.
step.stepresult: Your computer's file system viewer will open to the folder containing your project, which will be highlighted.
